sentences.sentence: He was fully clothed and covered in puke and piss.
sentences.translation: 他全身都沾满了呕吐物和尿。

sentences.sentence: I figured, why eat when I was going to puke it up again?
sentences.translation: 我在想，既然我马上就会再吐，那为什么还吃呢?

sentences.sentence: When you feel your fever worsen, head to the restroom. Go to a cubicle and force yourself to puke.
sentences.translation: 当你感到烧得更厉害时，去洗手间，到小隔间强迫自己呕吐。
